languages.text: Торговец был потерян. Остается только отомстить тем, кто посмел напасть на подданных Империума.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Защитить торговца не удалось — так хоть отомстим.

languages.text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Торговец был потерян. Остается только отомстить тем, кто посмел напасть на подданных Империума.

traits.locale_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.
The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.
The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

languages.text: 那位商人已经不知去向。如今唯一能做的事情，就是向这些胆敢袭击帝国臣民的敌人展开复仇。
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 那位商人已经不知去向。如今唯一能做的事情，就是向这些胆敢袭击帝国臣民的敌人展开复仇。

languages.text: 商人は失われてしまった。今できることは、帝国臣民を攻撃した者たちに復讐することだけだ。
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 商人は失われてしまった。今できることは、帝国臣民を攻撃した者たちに復讐することだけだ。

languages.text: El mercader ha caído. Lo único que puedes hacer ahora es vengarte de quienes han osado atacar a los súbditos del Imperium.
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: El mercader ha caído. Lo único que puedes hacer ahora es vengarte de quienes han osado atacar a los súbditos del Imperium.

languages.text: Der Händler war nicht zu retten. Jetzt geht es nur noch darum, Vergeltung an den Verbrechern zu üben, die es wagen, Diener des Imperiums zu attackieren.
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Der Händler war nicht zu retten. Jetzt geht es nur noch darum, Vergeltung an den Verbrechern zu üben, die es wagen, Diener des Imperiums zu attackieren.

languages.text: Le marchand est perdu. Il ne reste plus qu'une chose à faire : se venger de ceux qui ont osé s'attaquer aux sujets de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Le marchand est perdu. Il ne reste plus qu'une chose à faire : se venger de ceux qui ont osé s'attaquer aux sujets de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Tüccar kaybedildi. Artık yapılabilecek tek şey, İmparatorluk tebaasına saldırma cüreti gösterenlerden intikam almak.
languages.original_text: The merchant was lost. All that can be done now is to take revenge on those who dared to attack the subjects of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Tüccar kaybedildi. Artık tek yapılabilecek şey, İmparatorluk'a tabi olanlara saldırma cüreti gösterenlerden intikam almak.
